ygData.subject: Re: Welcome to EQ_women@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/29/1999 11:44:57 PM Central Daylight Time, EQ_women-owner@onelist.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/29/1999 11:44:57 PM Central Daylight Time,
EQ_women-owner@onelist.com writes:

<< Hi there, and welcome to EQ Women! This mailing list is for women who
play the game Everquest to meet eachother and chat.

You can post to the list by replying to this message,
or by emailing "EQ_women@onelist.com". >>

Salutations!
I am sorry to come on here but I have a question.
I am about to buy this game and I wanted to get some opinion from some of you
who are in it about it and how good it is and whether it is worth the cost.
I was also curious if someone could tell me what the cost is, after the
initial expense of buying the game. The game at the local Best Buy does not
give the monthly charge on it at all.
I have never been in an online game before so this will be a first.
Please feel free to contact me at Brangvyne@... if you can answer any of
these questions.
And don't worry, I wont clutter your list up with any other posts until I'm
officially a member of the game.
:o)
Brangvyne
